articles.title: The making of KEF LS60 Wireless: active vs passive, Blade influence, and the next 60 years of KEF speakers - What Hi-Fi?
articles.description: We sit down with KEF's Jack Oclee-Brown, who says the new LS60 Wireless is the "transition point" for him in the passive vs active debate...
articles.content: “If you're making an active speaker, it doesn't necessarily make sense to do the driver or acoustic design in the same way you would with a passive. You can, that's fine – but then you forego the opp… [+19628 chars]

articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: Galaxy Z Flip 4 leak shows a very familiar looking foldable - The Verge
articles.description: Unofficial renders of the Z Flip 4 have leaked. It could be a very similar-looking device to its predecessor. Its exterior design appears more or less unchanged, and inside there’s still a 6.7-inch foldable display.
articles.content:
Unofficial renders look a lot like the Z Flip 3
